column4: hiI I have installed gtkwifi and can't seem to add it to my panel because it doesn't appear in the list when I click Add To Panel. . .  .Any ideas?
- is there a menu to do it from or must I use terminal? I just don't want to do it rudely and have never restarted the panel
if you just do killall gnome-panel at a term, it will start back up
